item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 closed in a correction on Thursday, ending the day more than 10% off its high, as stocks headed for weekly losses. What's on CNBC's radar ...

item.title: Morningstar likes these solid dividend payers when markets get choppy
item.description: A trio of real estate investment trusts could provide solid prospects for income. Two of them are dividend aristocrats.

item.title: Two stocks for investors' buy lists during this sell-off, according to Tim Seymour
item.description: The market sell-off could be a buying opportunity for these two names, according to Tim Seymour of Seymour Asset Management.

item.title: Retail investors can't quit their love for Tesla
item.description: Everyday investors cumulatively bought $4.1 billion in stock of the electric vehicle maker since March 4, even as the stock plunged.

item.title: Josh Brown gives 4 of the best stocks out there as market craters
item.description: Thursday, the S&P 500 had fallen 10% from its recent high, entering a correction. Investors faced continued uncertainty about President Trump's trade ...
